name: WP Dashboard Eathim
author: Rawshan ali

sections.description:
Its Awesome. Only 1 Plugin and have 2 widgets. you do not need any shortcode and customization.
Just Install and Enjoy 2 Dashboard Widgets.

A few notes about the sections above:

  • User Status – Show your all user like as admin, administator, author, subscriber. and edit them.
  • Todo List – Add, edit, delete your list

Features
WP Dashboard Eathim has many feature.

  • Includes 2 awesome Dashboard widgets
  • Easy to set up and customize options

Privacy
It does not set any coockies. and does not links any third party location. this plugin does not collect any data of user.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-dashboard-eathim directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Dashboard->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
How to install this Plugins

Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-dashboard-eathim directory

How to see Widgets

Goto Dashboard or click the clink dashboard of plugin links
